title: Bachelor of Science in Nursing
description: The Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) will prepare you for various nursing practices and guide you toward becoming a registered nurse. You will be ready to assist and support various patient needs and interact with individuals, families, community groups and populations across the human lifespan and the vast range of healthcare environments.
careers: Forensic Nurse, Registered Nurse, Legal Nurse Consultant, Health Policy Nurse, Health Coach.
